alternateName: Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight
description: Five years after the death of the Emperor of Marmo in the War of Heroes, Parn is now the Free Knight of Lodoss. The Emperor's right-hand-man, Ashram, seeks the Scepter of Domination to re-unify Lodoss under his former leader's ban...
keywords: dungeons and dragons,anime animation,sword and sorcery,remake,based on novel
name: Lodoss to Senki: Eiyuu kishi den

review.name: A Partial Sequel...
review.reviewBody: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight is a semi-sequel to the excellent anime OAV Record of Lodoss War. The first part of the series is basically a re-telling of the events from Records.. and tells the story a slightly a different way. I believe it is the "TV Series" version of the story. The animation is better but I personally prefer the OAV. The Second part is a sequel and follows Spark, an aspiring Free Knight who's hero is Parn, we get to see the original characters and what has happened to them. We also meet Little Neese, daughter of Slayn and Laylia whom Spark vows to protect from her destiny. The animation for this part is great, and it's got a great story just like the OAV, I recommend it for all Lodoss fans, fantasy fans and anime fans!

trailer.description: Record Of Lodoss War: A New Legend Begins
trailer.name: Record Of Lodoss War: A New Legend Begins
